com.mvp4g.client.event
Class BaseEventBus

java.lang.Object
  com.mvp4g.client.event.BaseEventBus
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventBus
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseEventBusWithLookUp
public class BaseEventBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventBus

Base implementation of the event bus. It should only be used by the framework.

Author:
plcoirier

 boolean isHistoryStored()
          Indicate if events are stored in browser history when possible (ie when associated with an history converter).
protected  void place(Mvp4gModule module, java.lang.String type, java.lang.Object form)

 void setHistoryStored(boolean historyStored)
          Indicate for all events if they should be stored or not in browser history when possible (ie when associated with an history converter).
 void setHistoryStoredForNextOne(boolean historyStored)
          Indicate for next event that can be stored in history only if it should be stored or not in browser history.

This method should be called only right before sending an event that could be stored in browser history.

Indicate if events are stored in browser history when possible (ie when associated with an history converter).

setHistoryStored

public void setHistoryStored(boolean historyStored)
Description copied from interface: EventBus
Indicate for all events if they should be stored or not in browser history when possible (ie when associated with an history converter).

setHistoryStoredForNextOne

public void setHistoryStoredForNextOne(boolean historyStored)
Description copied from interface: EventBus
Indicate for next event that can be stored in history only if it should be stored or not in browser history.

This method should be called only right before sending an event that could be stored in browser history.

Specified by:

Parameters:
historyStored - true if events should be stored
